page.title: 14CLUBS AND CHARITIES
page.content: The N.S.P.C.C. is a charity,it helps children who have been beaten.The chairman of the Penwortham branch is Mr.McGuinness. The 8th Penwortham scouts have a hut on Queensway,the cubs,brownies and beavers also use the hut.The scouts are hoping to build a new hut. The Knights of St.Columba are a charity that collects money for the "third world" countries. CAFOD are similiar to the Knights of St.Columba. St.Vincent de Paul helps poor homeless children. There are two social clubs St.Teresa's and St.Mary's. There are three play groups, Kensington ,St.Teresa's and Blashaw Lane.
